docs.lead_paragraph: The foundations of the two of the world's richest men are stepping up efforts to use innovative data and mobile technology to end easily preventable deaths of mothers and newborns in the poorest pockets of Mexico and Central America.

headline.main: Gates, Slim Target Maternal, Newborn Health in Central America
headline.print_headline: Gates, Slim Target Maternal, Newborn Health in Central America

docs.snippet: The foundations of the two of the world's richest men are stepping up efforts to use innovative data and mobile technology to end easily preventable deaths of mothers and newborns in the poorest pockets of Mexico and Central America.

docs.lead_paragraph: A precipitous plunge in the stock price of Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc cost some of Wall Street's top names billions of dollars on Wednesday but hedge fund manager William Ackman took the meltdown as a buying opportunity.

headline.main: Valeant Meltdown Costs Investors Billions; Ackman Ups Stake
headline.print_headline: Valeant Meltdown Costs Investors Billions; Ackman Ups Stake

docs.snippet: A precipitous plunge in the stock price of Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc cost some of Wall Street's top names billions of dollars on Wednesday but hedge fund manager William Ackman took the meltdown as a buying opportunity.

docs.lead_paragraph: The battle over whether states can mandate that food containing genetically engineered crops must be labeled moves to the U.S. Senate on Wednesday.

headline.main: Senate Committee Set to Examine GMO Labeling Law
headline.print_headline: Senate Committee Set to Examine GMO Labeling Law

docs.snippet: The battle over whether states can mandate that food containing genetically engineered crops must be labeled moves to the U.S. Senate on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Madhur Jaffrey is known to Americans — when she is known at all — as an author of Indian cookbooks. And with good reason: she has written more than two dozen of them.

headline.main: From Actress to Cookbook Author: The Lives of Madhur Jaffrey
headline.print_headline: From Actress to Cookbook Author: The Lives of Madhur Jaffrey

docs.snippet: Madhur Jaffrey is known to Americans — when she is known at all — as an author of Indian cookbooks. And with good reason: she has written more than two dozen of them.

docs.lead_paragraph: Many factors, most of them linked to industrial-scale agriculture, are reducing bee populations around the world.

headline.main: A Dangerous Cycle in Food Production
headline.print_headline: A Dangerous Cycle in Food Production

docs.snippet: Many factors, most of them linked to industrial-scale agriculture, are reducing bee populations around the world.

docs.lead_paragraph: India's Women and Child Welfare Ministry on Tuesday denied that comments made to Reuters about the impact of budget cuts on a child nutrition program constituted a criticism of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's policies.

headline.main: Indian Child Welfare Ministry Denies Criticism of Government Policies
headline.print_headline: Indian Child Welfare Ministry Denies Criticism of Government Policies

docs.snippet: India's Women and Child Welfare Ministry on Tuesday denied that comments made to Reuters about the impact of budget cuts on a child nutrition program constituted a criticism of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's policies.

docs.lead_paragraph: Veterans of the food industry have taken the tricks and trades of Big Food to food start-ups looking to disrupt the market.

headline.main: New and Healthier Food Choices Are Being Pushed by Old Hands

docs.snippet: Veterans of the food industry have taken the tricks and trades of Big Food to food start-ups looking to disrupt the market.

docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. Winfrey will buy newly issued shares, worth about 10 percent of the company, and take a seat on the board.

headline.main: Shares of Weight Watchers Jump as Oprah Winfrey Takes a Stake
headline.print_headline: Winfrey’s Pick Sends a Stock Soaring

docs.abstract: Oprah Winfrey says she will buy 10 percent share of Weight Watchers and take board seat; move causes stock to double to $13.92 a share, adding $400 million value; it is her first big investment in public company.
docs.snippet: Ms. Winfrey will buy newly issued shares, worth about 10 percent of the company, and take a seat on the board.

byline.contributor: Michael J. de la Merced contributed reporting.

docs.lead_paragraph: Poor harvests across much of southern Africa mean that nearly 30 million people will struggle to get adequate nutrition in the months ahead, the United Nations said Monday.

headline.main: UN Says Food Needs Increasing in Southern Africa
headline.print_headline: UN Says Food Needs Increasing in Southern Africa

docs.snippet: Poor harvests across much of southern Africa mean that nearly 30 million people will struggle to get adequate nutrition in the months ahead, the United Nations said Monday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations children's agency (UNICEF) on Monday launched a $2.8 million (1.80 million pound) appeal to help children affected by a typhoon that tore across the northern Philippines over the weekend, forcing thousands from their homes.

headline.main: UNICEF Launches $2.8 Million Appeal for Children in Typhoon-Hit Philippines
headline.print_headline: UNICEF Launches $2.8 Million Appeal for Children in Typhoon-Hit Philippines

docs.snippet: The United Nations children's agency (UNICEF) on Monday launched a $2.8 million (1.80 million pound) appeal to help children affected by a typhoon that tore across the northern Philippines over the weekend, forcing thousands from their homes.
